title: Watering Alert: Heartleaf Philodendron
description: Your Heartleaf Philodendron has received too much water from rain. Please check the soil moisture.

title: Temperature Warning: Tropical Plant
description: The temperature has dropped too low for your Tropical Plant. Consider moving it to a warmer location.

title: Watering Reminder: Indoor Plant
description: Don't forget to water your Indoor Plant today.

title: Fertilizer Needed: Flower Plant
description: It's time to fertilize your Flower Plant. Use a balanced fertilizer for best results.

title: Sunlight Alert: Decor Plant
description: Your Decor Plant is not receiving enough sunlight. Move it to a brighter spot.
